content: crochet this lovely raglan sweater using an easy step by step instructions crochet houndstooth is a lovely stitch that looks good on both sides with this pattern you won t cut yarn after each round but carry it along the project the sweater is available in sizes xs to 2xl you are free to sell your finished sweater i would request you to link the pattern back to me if you are selling online if you have any questions please don t hesitate to ask i will guide you anytime
